column4: i have done an installation of ubuntu and have an existing home partition on the disk - whats the best util to alter the fstab - is it just terminal and vi?
are you comforable with vi?  do you want a gui app?
nano is more popular then vi 'round here.  i know of no tool to edit /etc/fstab (doesn't really need one ;)
yes fine with vi - have always done it that way
